name: Awesome Time Game
description:
Time is short but luckily the clock on ticks when the player is moving. Beware that timephased monsters have invaded that will move when time stands still. Player must figure out a way past the monsters to grab the clock that stops time and opens the door to the next stage.

Controls:

"F" on keyboard toggles fullscreen.

w,s,a,d  or up,down,left,right  and spacebar

Game also supports xbox 360/One Gamepad

Chiptune info:

www.playonloop.com
Filippo Vicarelli
"Moon Castle"

Graphics created in PyxelEdit

SFX made with Bfxr (www.bfxr.net)

Game engine: Construct 3 (www.construct.net)
